#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
class chef{
	int x1,y1,x2,y2;
	int xx1,yy1,xx2,yy2;
	public:
		chef()
		{
			cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2;
			cin>>xx1>>yy1>>xx2>>yy2;
			int ar1,ar2,ar,count,count1,i;
			int arr[1002]={0};
			int arr2[1002]={0};
			ar1=ar2=count=count1=0;
			ar1=(x2-x1)*(y2-y1);
			ar2=(xx2-xx1)*(yy2-yy1);
			for(i=x1;i<=x2;i++)
			arr[i]++;
			for(i=xx1;i<=xx2;i++)
			if(arr[i]==1)
			count++;
			if(count>0)
			count-=1;
			for(i=y1;i<=y2;i++)
			arr2[i]++;
			for(i=yy1;i<=yy2;i++)
			if(arr2[i]==1)
			count1++;
			if(count1>0)
			count1-=1;
			ar=count*count1;
			ar1=ar1+ar2-ar;
			cout<<ar1<<endl;
		}
};
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)

		chef c;
	}

}
